targets.rawSql:
SELECT
 (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM now()) - EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM MAX(f.date))) / 3600 as "Food tracking",
 (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM now()) - EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM MAX(e.date))) / 3600 as "Excersise tracking"
FROM personal_data.food_entries f, personal_data.exercise_entries  e
WHERE f.user_id = ${user} and e.user_id = ${user} ;

SELECT
  w."date" AS time,
  w.weight_kg
  --, w.user_id
  --u.fatsecret_user_id
FROM personal_data.weights w
--JOIN personal_data.users u ON w.user_id = u.id
WHERE w.user_id = ${user}
ORDER BY w."date" DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
TO_CHAR(MAX(f.date) , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Food tracking",
TO_CHAR(MAX(e.date) , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "Exercise tracking"
FROM personal_data.food_entries f, personal_data.exercise_entries   e
WHERE f.user_id = ${user} and e.user_id = ${user} 
-- and f.calories != 0 and e.calories != 0

SELECT
  COALESCE(f.date, e.date) AS time,
  COALESCE(f.total_calories, 0) AS "Calories Consumed",
  COALESCE(e.total_calories, 0) AS "Calories Burned",
  COALESCE(f.total_calories, 0) - COALESCE(e.total_calories, 0) AS "Calorie Balance"
FROM (
  SELECT
    date,
    SUM(Calories) AS total_calories
  FROM personal_data.food_entries
  WHERE date = TO_TIMESTAMP(${days} / 1000)::date AND user_id = ${user} 
  GROUP BY date
) f
FULL OUTER JOIN (
  SELECT
    date,
    SUM(Calories) AS total_calories
  FROM personal_data.exercise_entries
  WHERE date = TO_TIMESTAMP(${days} / 1000)::date AND user_id = ${user} 
  GROUP BY date
) e
ON f.date = e.date
ORDER BY time

SELECT  
  ROUND((SUM(fat) * 9) * 100.0 / NULLIF((SUM(fat) * 9 + SUM(carbohydrate) * 4 + SUM(protein) * 4), 0), 1) AS fats,
  ROUND((SUM(carbohydrate) * 4) * 100.0 / NULLIF((SUM(fat) * 9 + SUM(carbohydrate) * 4 + SUM(protein) * 4), 0), 1) AS carbs,
  ROUND((SUM(protein) * 4) * 100.0 / NULLIF((SUM(fat) * 9 + SUM(carbohydrate) * 4 + SUM(protein) * 4), 0), 1) AS proteins    
FROM
  personal_data.food_entries f
WHERE
  user_id = ${user}
  AND date = TO_TIMESTAMP(${days} / 1000) :: date
;

SELECT
  date AS time,
  SUM(fat) AS "Fats",
  SUM(carbohydrate) AS "Carbs",
  SUM(protein) AS "Proteins",
  SUM(fiber) AS "Fibers"

FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE user_id = ${user} and date = TO_TIMESTAMP(${days} / 1000)::date AND user_id = ${user} 
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT  1

select meal_type, sum(calories) from personal_data.food_entries f
WHERE user_id = ${user} and date = TO_TIMESTAMP(${days} / 1000)::date AND user_id = ${user} 
group by meal_type 
order by 2 desc

SELECT
e.time, coalesce("meals count", 0) as "Meals logged"
FROM (
SELECT
  date AS time,
  count (distinct meal_type) as "meals count"
FROM personal_data.food_entries 
WHERE user_id = ${user} and date = TO_TIMESTAMP(${days} / 1000)::date AND user_id = ${user} 
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date
) f
FULL OUTER JOIN (
  SELECT
  date AS time
  FROM personal_data.exercise_entries ee  
WHERE user_id = ${user} and date = TO_TIMESTAMP(${days} / 1000)::date AND user_id = ${user} 
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date
) e
ON f.time = e.time
ORDER BY e.time

SELECT
  --date AS time,
  food_name,
  calories,
  fat,
  carbohydrate,
  protein,
  fiber
FROM
  personal_data.food_entries f
WHERE
  user_id = ${user}
  and date = TO_TIMESTAMP(${days} / 1000) :: date
  AND user_id = ${user}
  and meal_type = 'Breakfast'

SELECT  
  ROUND((SUM(fat) * 9) * 100.0 / NULLIF((SUM(fat) * 9 + SUM(carbohydrate) * 4 + SUM(protein) * 4), 0), 1) AS fats,
  ROUND((SUM(carbohydrate) * 4) * 100.0 / NULLIF((SUM(fat) * 9 + SUM(carbohydrate) * 4 + SUM(protein) * 4), 0), 1) AS carbs,
  ROUND((SUM(protein) * 4) * 100.0 / NULLIF((SUM(fat) * 9 + SUM(carbohydrate) * 4 + SUM(protein) * 4), 0), 1) AS proteins    
FROM
  personal_data.food_entries f
WHERE
  user_id = ${user}
  AND date = TO_TIMESTAMP(${days} / 1000) :: date
  AND meal_type = 'Breakfast'
;

and meal_type = 'Lunch'

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT u.fatsecret_user_id AS __text, u.id AS __value
FROM personal_data.users u
JOIN personal_data.weights w ON w.user_id = u.id
ORDER BY u.fatsecret_user_id;
list.name: user
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT u.fatsecret_user_id AS __text, u.id AS __value
FROM personal_data.users u
JOIN personal_data.weights w ON w.user_id = u.id
ORDER BY u.fatsecret_user_id;

list.definition:
SELECT 
  date AS __value,
  CASE
    WHEN date = CURRENT_DATE THEN 'Today, ' || TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    WHEN date = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day' THEN 'Yesterday, ' || TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    WHEN date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '14 days'
         AND date < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
         AND EXTRACT(DOW FROM date) = EXTRACT(DOW FROM CURRENT_DATE)
         THEN 'Last ' || TO_CHAR(date, 'FMDay') || ', ' || TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    WHEN date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '14 days'
         AND date < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
         THEN 'Last ' || TO_CHAR(date, 'FMDay') || ', ' || TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    ELSE TO_CHAR(date, 'FMDay, YYYY-MM-DD')
  END AS __text
FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '14 days'
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC;
list.name: days
list.query:
SELECT 
  date AS __value,
  CASE
    WHEN date = CURRENT_DATE THEN 'Today, ' || TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    WHEN date = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day' THEN 'Yesterday, ' || TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    WHEN date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '14 days'
         AND date < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
         AND EXTRACT(DOW FROM date) = EXTRACT(DOW FROM CURRENT_DATE)
         THEN 'Last ' || TO_CHAR(date, 'FMDay') || ', ' || TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    WHEN date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '14 days'
         AND date < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
         THEN 'Last ' || TO_CHAR(date, 'FMDay') || ', ' || TO_CHAR(date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
    ELSE TO_CHAR(date, 'FMDay, YYYY-MM-DD')
  END AS __text
FROM personal_data.food_entries
WHERE date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '14 days'
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC;
